verbose_text: Since the LP-macrophages from the ketanserin treated mice with colitis exhibited a high level of CD206, a marker of M2 macrophages (as shown by FACS analysis), we therefore measured the mRNA levels of iNOS, CD32 and IL-12 p40, as M1 polarization markers, and the levels of CD206 and IL-10, as M2 polarization markers in the LP-macrophages in all 3 groups.
evidence: levels of iNOS, CD32 and IL-12 p40
